    Welcome to TokaLab

    Your open-access gateway to the world of fusion research and education. TokaLab is a virtual tokamak environment designed to facilitate synthetic experiments, enhance learning, and test numerical codes.

    About TokaLab

    At TokaLab, we provide you with essential tools and resources, including codes in MATLAB and Python, to explore the complexities of tokamak operations...

    Our Mission

    Our mission is built on three core pillars:

    • Education: TokaLab serves as an invaluable tool for students...
    • Open Access: We aim to cultivate a community...
    • Research: TokaLab provides a platform for testing and validating codes...

    Join Us

    Join us at TokaLab and be part of a pioneering initiative...

    SimPla

    To simulate your plasma equilibrium.

    SynDiag

    To design your diagnostics.

    VirtualLab

    To conduct your experiment.
